items.sentence: According to the weather report, it'll snow tonight.
There was once a time when I could not trust others.
My little brother always sleeps with his teddy bear.
My mother stopped her sewing and picked up her book.
Tom still hasn't done everything we asked him to do.
A camel can drink up to one hundred liters of water.
As far as I know, I don't have any family in Boston.
For a long time, I stood there pondering what to do.
A smile doesn't cost anything. Give one to everyone.
I fell asleep while I was listening to an audiobook.
